Necromacer curled his wings in front of him taking the brunt of Mobsters at=
tack. small cracks began to form where the shots struck. He roared partly i=
n intimidation and partly in disgust at the Alliance bot before him. he fir=
ed an ice blast from his mouth followed by a fireball out of each nostril.
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Friday, January 05, 2001 3:26 PM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice

=

  Mobster ducked the ice blast. Horn Drill being the controller of the lef=
t arm, and the sharpshooter, it was a bit difficult to get an aim, since it=
 was Kracken trying to aim, him being the right arm. Mobster fired twice at=
 Necromancer...

    From: CYBERWOLF4 
   =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

ject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    very convenient that he happens to be left =
handed.

    Necromancer flew to the right as the heat from the blast singe=
d his arm. "If I take a blast in this form I'll be nothing more than a spot=
 on the ground." he thought as he flew closer to the gestault. He fired ano=
ther ice blast from his rifle then transformed back to dragon to compensate=
 power with power. "OK Monster, let's see what you can do."
      ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
     Sent: Sunday, December 31, 2000 2:26 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry souls=
tice


      Mobster's eyes grow large. He taps into Horn Drill's speed, bu=
t the ice blast hits him on the left arm, freezing it. Mobster points at hi=
s arm, mumbling to himself.

      Mobster: Look! Look! You shall not live =
after that! Just look!

      Mobster was oddly enough, left handed. He pic=
ked up the blaster with his right hand now, aiming at Necromancer's head an=
d firing, but the shot headed towards Necromancer's shoulder instead...

wrpg@egroups.com

ubject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        By the time the explosion cleared Nec=
romancer was as close to the entrance of the Cybertronian fire as he could =
get. He set Razor Claw down and turned back to where he had left Mobster, H=
e was the only bot left that was big enough to fight the Gestault and have =
a chance of winning. He saw Mobster in the distance, he looked something li=
ke the Coyote after a failed attempt to catch the roadrunner. He was to far=
 away to hear the taunting from the giant. The great dragon shrunk down, tr=
ansforming to bot mode, he was still one of the larger bots on the battlefi=
eld but at least now he had a chance to blend in. He raised his weapon and =
fired a ice blast at Mobster, it looked like the only way to fight this bat=
tle would be for a dragonto use guerilla tactics.

Message ----- 
          From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

          Subject: Re: S=
orry soulstice


          Mobster is burnt massively by the fireball. He s=
till was standing.

          Mobster: I think you are...scared...of me...

0 7:00 AM

            Necromance=
r picks up Razor Claw, "You've seen enough action for today." He transforms=
 back to his dragon form to carry the raptor away from the battle only to b=
e struck in the back by mobsters shots. "Looks like the only way out of thi=
s is through him." 

            Necromancer flies into the air carrying Ra=
zorclaw in one of his claws. He launches a white fireball at Mobster, follo=
wed by a blue one. the blue catches up and causes the white one to explode =
in a brilliance of blinding light and searing heat. (Little chemistry note-=
 White and Blue are two of the hottest in the laws of Physics.)

s at Razorclaw...

 him from the power of the blast but he'd taxxed it to it's limits. he fell=
 to the ground again spent from the physical exhertion he'd put on himself.=
 He picked himself up again insisting on being destroyed on his feet. Fireb=
alls hit Mobster causing Razor Claw to look back. Necromancer had arrived i=
n time to save him.

                Necromancer saw that he had Mobsters f=
ull attention when the giant fired on him. He transformed to robot mode shr=
inking down to a smaller target to dodge the blast. he rased his rifle and =
set it on high power. he fired five blasts at the head of Mobster as he fle=
w down to check the condition of the Raptor he'd just saved.

he stepped forward, ready for anything the larger bot had to offer. "You re=
ady to surrender yet?" He asked sarcastically even though he already knew t=
he answer.

nd composure, he wanted to knock it out of Razorclaw again...

                        Razor Claw bounced off Mob=
ster, the impact made his head spin. The mighty raptor heard Mobster have s=
ome smart ass comment toward him. He looked up in time to see Mobster raise=
 his weapon again. Razor Claw turned and tried to run and got just far enou=
gh to avoid being hit directly by the beam. The weapon still had a devastat=
ing effect on him though as the shrapnel of dirt and pebbles shred at his s=
kin. The blast shot him about sixty yards from where he'd started. He lande=
d with an ooof as his body skipped multiple times across the hard African g=
round. There he lay in pain, trying to regain his strength and composure.

ster wobbled some, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

ve him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. His energy was low so he di=
dn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran toward Mobster. Mobsters f=
oot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impact shook the ground sendin=
g Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled to his feat and turn=
ed again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters rear end hoping the =
giant would still be off balance enough to knock over.

obster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...

ound him. He opened a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any availabl=

 way to survive a blast from a weapon of that size. he transformed to Rapto=
r mode and used full strength on his shield. The ground around him incinera=
ted on contact. He survived but it was sapping to much of his strength. The=
 raptor couldn't move without deactivating his shield.

d.

oups.com

                              Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still sh=
owing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make this interesting, =
you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to=
 the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm back and thre=
w an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."

 SOULSTICE

 best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I a=
m not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of =
the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you s=
hould join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

s didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ba=
ll. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he again came thr=
ough for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the siz=
e of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized b=
ot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

                    Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The p=
unch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused th=
e Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He lo=
oked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that was=
n't your best shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".

aw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for =

ht. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "Yo=
